metadata.title: CVE-2020-10232 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In version 4.8.0 and earlier of The Sleuth Kit (TSK), there is a stackbuffer overflow vulnerability in the YAFFS file timestamp parsing logic inyaffsfs_istat() in fs/yaffs.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtsk19t64 - 4.11.1+dfsg-1
sleuthkit - 4.11.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.1+dfsg-1').
